title: Monkey Punch: Manga Katsudou Daishashin
alternative_title: Mankatsu, モンキー・パンチ　漫画活動大写真
description: A TV series from Monkey Punch with a 1-hour premiere episode. Mankatsu will feature standard "Monkey characters" and ecchi-gags found in all Monkey Punch series.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Ecchi>, <Genre -> Parody>, <Genre -> Seinen>]
